about_the_game:
NSFW Gay Visual Novel Dating Sim!

Play Episode 1 Free on Steam!

Black Ops soldiers Wraith and Tide know they must count on each other to survive. Will their bond as battle-brothers evolve into something more? Monster Ops: Military Special Forces Hunting Rogue Monsters!

This is an open-ended series with no ending planned. It's like a TV show that will continue until it's canceled.

The story continues in the 5th episode of this visual novel series!  With dialogue options and NSFW scenes!

After two harrowing missions, Tide has paid his dues and can finally learn the truth about their assignment--and the truth about his Captain, Wraith.  

Shocks and revelations abound and Wraith and Tide's bond deepens, all while they begin to notice Balasque's suspicious behavior.

Tide's Brigadier General father is introduced.  He's discovered that his old enemy meddling with the team and now races to Site 6 to deal with them!

Stay tuned for the Mid-Season Finale Coming in Episode 6!!!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scenes of explicit sexual content.

  • Processor: 1.2ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
